entities.name: veritas
entities.description: The name of a book mentioned in the text

entities.name: winky
entities.description: A house-elf who is bound to Harry Potter's family and tries to protect him from the Death Eaters

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: A group of non-magical people that Winky and Harry's father are trying to free

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who follow the Dark Lord Voldemort

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The title given to Voldemort by his followers

entities.name: ministry wizards
entities.description: A group of wizards who work for the Ministry of Magic and are trying to stop the Death Eaters

relationships.description: Winky tries to protect Harry from the Death Eaters by binding him with her magic
The Death Eaters are followers of the Dark Lord Voldemort
The Ministry wizards are trying to free the Muggles from the Death Eaters
